Name: Sternfrost Prism
Title: Cryo Hypostasis: Sternfrost Prism
Desc: Despite its highly stable form and almost machine-like movements, it must still meticulously defend its weak spot...
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Cryo Hypostasis at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Sternfrost Prism
Talent.Desc: Can only be played if your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2103]</color>: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121034]</color> to them.\nAfter $[A2103], who has this card equipped, triggers <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C121034]</color>: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1016]</color> to the opposing active character.\n(Your deck must contain $[A2103] to add this card to your deck)

C121034.Name: Cryo Crystal Core
C121034.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 1 HP.

K54.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Immunity to Defeat</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>
K54.Desc: Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#FFFFFFFF>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.\nWhen this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#FFFFFFFF>defeat.</color> (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)

K1016.Name: Sheer Cold
K1016.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Deal 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to the character to which this is attached.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF><color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>:1</color> (When the character with this attached has <color=#FFFFFFFF>Blazing Heat</color> attached to them, remove this effect.)
